alert.note: Alert for Shackelford; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 02 at 11:26AM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Shackelford and southeastern Throckmorton Counties through 1230 PM CST... At 1126 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Us-180 Near The Shackelford- Stephens County Line, or near Ibex, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Albany, Woodson, Elbert, Ibex, Us-180 Near The Shackelford- Stephens County Line and Lusk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
